languages.text: "Признаться, не думал, что назначение на корабль Вольного Торговца принесет такие приключения".
"I have to admit, I didn't realise that being assigned to a Rogue Trader's ship would lead to such exploits."
languages.original_text: "Признаться, не думал, что назначение на корабль Вольного Торговца принесет такие приключения".

traits.locale_text: "I have to admit, I didn't realise that being assigned to a Rogue Trader's ship would lead to such exploits."
"I have to admit, I didn't realise that being assigned to a Rogue Trader's ship would lead to such exploits."
"I have to admit, I didn't realise that being assigned to a Rogue Trader's ship would lead to such exploits."
"I have to admit, I didn't realise that being assigned to a Rogue Trader's ship would lead to such exploits."
"I have to admit, I didn't realise that being assigned to a Rogue Trader's ship would lead to such exploits."

languages.text: "Ich gebe zu, mir war nicht klar, was mein Dienst auf dem Schiff {mf|eines Freihändlers| einer Freihändlerin} mit sich bringt."
languages.original_text: "I have to admit, I didn't realise that being assigned to a Rogue Trader's ship would lead to such exploits."

traits.locale_text: "Ich gebe zu, mir war nicht klar, was mein Dienst auf dem Schiff {mf|eines Freihändlers| einer Freihändlerin} mit sich bringt."

languages.text: « Je dois admettre que quand on m'a affecté à la garde d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}, j'étais loin de me douter qu'il me faudrait réaliser de tels exploits. »
languages.original_text: "I have to admit, I didn't realise that being assigned to a Rogue Trader's ship would lead to such exploits."

traits.locale_text: « Je dois admettre que quand on m'a affecté à la garde d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}, j'étais loin de me douter qu'il me faudrait réaliser de tels exploits. »

languages.text: 「正直に言うと、ローグトレーダーの船に配属されることで、こんな冒険に巻き込まれるとは思いませんでした」
languages.original_text: "I have to admit, I didn't realise that being assigned to a Rogue Trader's ship would lead to such exploits."

traits.locale_text: 「正直に言うと、ローグトレーダーの船に配属されることで、こんな冒険に巻き込まれるとは思いませんでした」

languages.text: «Debo admitir que no esperaba que un puesto en la nave de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente incluyera estas labores».
languages.original_text: "I have to admit, I didn't realise that being assigned to a Rogue Trader's ship would lead to such exploits."

traits.locale_text: «Debo admitir que no esperaba que un puesto en la nave de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente incluyera estas labores».

languages.text: “我得承认，当初被分配到行商浪人的船上时，我没想过会和你走到如今这一步。”
languages.original_text: "I have to admit, I didn't realise that being assigned to a Rogue Trader's ship would lead to such exploits."

traits.locale_text: “我得承认，当初被分配到行商浪人的船上时，我没想过会和你走到如今这一步。”

languages.text: "Hür Tacir'in gemisinde karşıma böyle fırsatlar çıkacağını tahmin edemezdim."
languages.original_text: "I have to admit, I didn't realise that being assigned to a Rogue Trader's ship would lead to such exploits."

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir'in gemisinde karşıma böyle fırsatlar çıkacağını tahmin edemezdim."
